page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content:
Most semi_detached houses are on the army estate by Monxton Road and on minor roads leading off Weyhill Road. l3 out of thirty members of our class live in semi-detached houses.
There are detached houses on both sides of the Weyhill Road, Charlton Road, Monxton Road, Rooksbury Road. Some arebeing built on Danehurst Place, also at Penton, Mylen Road and RedpostLane. 6members of the class live in detached houses. Most terraced houses are in the King George Road area; at Gallaghers Mead, Artists Wayand The Crescent. There are a few on the army estate and also at OldDown Road, Lancster Clse, Nester Close, Nester Close and Harrowway Road. l member of the class lives in a terraced house. There are lots of bungalows between Portway school and
